abstract: General Electric plans to repay the $3 billion investment that Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway made during the financial crisis, along with a $300 million bonus.
snippet: General Electric plans to repay the $3 billion investment that Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway made during the financial crisis, along with a $300 million bonus.
lead_paragraph: Mario Anzuoni/ReutersWarren E. Buffett will get back $3 billion that he invested in General Electric during the financial crisis, plus a $300 million bonus.

headline.main: G.E. Will Pay Back $3 Billion to Buffett

byline.original: By Susanne Craig and Ben Protess
